subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Patrik Elias has been a Devil since 1995-96 and is the team’s career leading scorer with 375 goals and 930 points in 1,090 regular-season games.
snippet: Patrik Elias has been a Devil since 1995-96 and is the team’s career leading scorer with 375 goals and 930 points in 1,090 regular-season games.
